mapper.select: SELECT t1.type_name AS name, COUNT(t2.kb_file_id) AS fileCount, t1.type_id AS typeId FROM kb_file_type t1 LEFT JOIN kb_file t2 ON t2.kb_file_type = t1.type_id AND t2.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY t1.type_id ORDER BY fileCount DESC

SELECT type_id, type_name, keyword from kb_file_type LEFT JOIN kb_file on kb_file_type.type_id = kb_file.kb_file_type LEFT JOIN kb_file_chunk on kb_file.kb_file_id = kb_file_chunk.file_id LEFT JOIN kb_file_chunk_keywords on kb_file_chunk.chunk_id = kb_file_chunk_keywords.chunk_id WHERE kb_file_type.is_deleted = 0 AND kb_file.is_deleted = 0 AND kb_file_chunk.is_deleted = 0 group by type_id, keyword order by type_id
